title: Bindi Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan, International, Organic, Raw, Western, Take-out, Gluten-free
description: Bindicafe is one of the few organic and veg restaurants in Amersfoort. The food is homemade which is (weekly) freshly prepared and mostly gluten-free or/and lactose-free. Bindicafe is open for coffee, lunch and diner 6 days a week. Check Facebook for weekly menu and opening hours. Inspiration for their dishes come from all over the world. Known for their vegan cakes and sweets which frequently are raw and also gluten-free, and may be served with herbal tea, coffee or juices. Customizing is always possible in case of food intolerance. Reported all vegan by owner Oct 2015.
